description: A 1:40,000-scale map of the popular Barron/Achray area on the east side of Algonquin Provincial Park. Home to the 100-m deep Barron Canyon, this section of the park also includes the Berm Lake Trail and the Eastern Pines Backpacking Trail. Use this map to plan a paddling trip along the Barron River, or the Grand, Stratton, St. Andrews, Opalescent, or Sec Lake canoe routes.
name: Adventure Map Algonquin - Barron/Achray Map
